letters.description: Gather comprehensive data on the cat's history, environment, behavior, and health status to identify key wellness indicators.
Investigate underlying factors contributing to wellness challenges, including medical conditions, stress triggers, and environmental deficiencies.
Develop a customized wellness plan incorporating evidence-based strategies for nutrition, enrichment, behavior modification, and stress reduction.
Monitor the cat's response to interventions, provide ongoing support to the owner, and adjust the plan as needed to ensure optimal results.
Establish long-term strategies for maintaining the cat's physical and emotional well-being through proactive care and environmental management.
